title: They had forgotten to cook rice

content.question: When did the author and her brother realize that they had forgotten to cook rice?

choices.label: As soon as their parents sat down at the table
Just before their parents arrived home
Right before they started put the cooked dishes on the table
Just when they finished cooking the last dish

content.answer: Just before their parents arrived home

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Determine the meaning of familiar and unfamiliar words.
